name: AI Study Assistant
description: An intelligent study companion that helps students organize their learning materials and provides personalized study recommendations.
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive AI-powered study assistant using machine learning algorithms to analyze student learning patterns and provide personalized recommendations. The system includes features for note organization, progress tracking, and adaptive learning path generation.

name: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard for visualizing and analyzing complex datasets with interactive charts and real-time updates.
longDescription: Built a powerful data visualization platform that allows users to upload datasets, perform exploratory data analysis, and create interactive visualizations. The dashboard supports multiple chart types, real-time data updates, and collaborative features for team analysis.

name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and professional experience.
longDescription: Designed and developed a comprehensive portfolio website using modern web technologies. The site features a clean, professional design with smooth animations, responsive layout, and optimized performance. Implemented a data-driven architecture for easy content management.
